excerpt.rendered:
The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Saturday 

Cream Pumpkin Soup – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml (pumpkin, white onion, carrot, celery, potato, coconut milk, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Rice Spaghetti with Shiitake Mushroom – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 300 g (rice spaghetti, shiitake mushroom, champinion mushroom, red bell pepper, red onion, tomato, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or gluten free option

Seeds Crackers Bread – raw / gluten free / 40 g (sun flower seeds, pumpkin seeds, flaxseed, dehydrated tomatoes, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Carrot and Pumpkin Cake – raw / gluten free / 110 g (carrot, pumpkin, almond, cashew, cowberry, cinnamon, coconut, cocoa butter, orange, lemon, ginger, curcuma, vanilla, unfiltered honey)
